name: Taxi Driver Sim: Hill Station 2016 – free yellow cab racing simulator in snow mountain
name_original: Taxi Driver Sim: Hill Station 2016 – free yellow cab racing simulator in snow mountain
description:
Welcome to Taxi Driver Sim: Hill station 2016
Are you fan of playing taxi driving & parking games? Then this is the best hill taxi driver game to play in snow & hilly environment. Taxi driving gets more exciting with this all new game. Drive on the hill roads and experience a gorgeous hill station like never before. Taxi driver simulator 2016 tells the secret about driving and parking in this taxi duty driver super fun simulator game you are going to experience what is taxi duty driver in the beautifully designed 3d snow mountain environment.

Taxi Driver Sim: Hill station 2016 Simulator Features :
- Amazing Hill Station Environment and 3D Graphics
- Real Taxi driver - drive passengers around the city
- Taxi parking missions - park your taxi
- Mountain - drive passengers through heavy traffic
- Best in the Hill taxi car driving game
